Text.SourceString: <LargeNormal>Say hello to the </><LargeStrong>Vindertech Perk Recombobulator™</> <LargeNormal>.  This new tool lets you customize weapon and trap perks for even more husk crushing power!</>
Text.LocalizedString: <LargeNormal>Say hello to the </><LargeStrong>Vindertech Perk Recombobulator™</> <LargeNormal>.  This new tool lets you customize weapon and trap perks for even more husk crushing power!</>

Text.SourceString: <LargeNormal>Many older items have to be converted before Recombobulation.</> <LargeStrong> The Recombobulation process will change some existing perks</><LargeNormal>, but if your converted items have </><LargeStrong>Free Slots</><LargeNormal> you can choose the new perks yourself!</>
Text.LocalizedString: <LargeNormal>Many older items have to be converted before Recombobulation.</> <LargeStrong> The Recombobulation process will change some existing perks</><LargeNormal>, but if your converted items have </><LargeStrong>Free Slots</><LargeNormal> you can choose the new perks yourself!</>

Text.SourceString: <LargeNormal>Try it out and perk up that armory!</>
Text.LocalizedString: <LargeNormal>Try it out and perk up that armory!</>
